resources.string: Blood Alcohol Calculator
Blood Alcohol Calculator - [Add Drink]
Warning!

The following program should only be used as a guide! As a result, the information on this site is NOT LEGAL ADVICE and is for entertainment purposes only. Keep in mind that actual blood alcohol concentrations are dependent on other factors such as genetics and previous meals. By proceeding to the next page, you agree that you accept all risks of using this program!\nNEVER DRINK AND DRIVE!
I AGREE
I DISAGREE
Enter Your Gender:

Add Drink

Please Enter the Alcohol Volume:
Please Enter the Alcohol Percentage:
Time It Was Consumed:
Add Drink...
Enter the Time You Would Like Your BAC:
Please Accept the Following Before Continuing:
I understand the blood alcohol level determined by this calculator may not reflect additional factors such as age, genetics, disease and metabolism.
I agree to not operate a motor vehicle under the influence of alcohol. If I do, I assume full risk of injury and death to myself and others.
Calculate BAC!
Your BAC:
Blood Alcohol Calculator - [Results]
-You will not feel any effects of alcohol.

-You may feel a little light headed.

-You may lose a little bit of shyness.

-However, you will not be affected by the antidepressant nature of alcohol.

-You will feel a sense of euphoria at this stage and probably feel a little more relaxed.

-Your behaviour may be a little more exaggerated or intensified.

-You likely have a little impairment of reasoning and memory.

-You will be able to tell that you are drinking at this level.

-This being said, you may feel that you are more alert than you actually are.

-You will have impairment of speech, balance and hearing.

-Impaired judgement is also common.

-You will have slurred speech at this level.

-Your balance, vision, hearing will also be impaired at this level.

-You may experience significant impairment of motor control and good judgement.

-You may have gross motor impairment. For example, texting would be very difficult.

-Also, your judgement will be severely impared.

-It is likely that any euphoria from previous phases would be replaced with dysphoria.

-You may start to feel sick to your stomach at this level.

-You may start to experience dysphoria and start to feel depressed.

-Motor coordination is severely depressed.

-You probably will not be able to walk by yourself.

-You will likely have reduced pain sensation (even if you get hurt).

-Some people may vomit at this stage.

-Most people will feel dazed and confused.

-NOTE: At this level your gag reflex is impared. This means you could aspirate vomit leading to asphyxiation.

-You likely have very little comprehension in regards to what you are doing at this level.

-You may pass out suddenly at this level and have a hard time waking up.

-NOTE: At this level your gag reflex is impared. This means you could aspirate vomit leading to asphyxiation.

-You could possibly fall into a coma at this level.

-You potentially may need medical attention at this level and could possibly die.

-NOTE: At this level your gag reflex is impared. This means you could aspirate vomit leading to asphyxiation.
